General.Name: Kronologi Asia Bhd
General.Description: Kronologi Asia Berhad, an investment holding company, provides hybrid and cloud enterprise data management (EDM) technology and solutions in Malaysia, Singapore, China, the Philippines, India, Hong Kong, Taiwan, and internationally. It operates through EDM Infrastructure Technology, EDM Managed Services, and Investment holding and Others segments. The company offers EDM hardware, which is used to record, store, and retain digital data; and EDM software to support the process of data backup, storage, recovery, and restoration. It also provides EDM managed services that comprise backup, storage, recovery, and restoration of enterprise data; health checks; capacity planning; remote monitoring; and disaster recovery services to facilitate data assurance and operational continuity. In addition, the company provides research, design, development, and business consulting services for information technology software, applications, multimedia development, information systems, data management software, data protection solutions and processes, system back-up and disaster recovery systems, and related businesses. Further, it offers managed services, including holistic comprehensive and automated daily backup targeted for medium sized enterprises; and administrative support services. Additionally, the company distributes and resells computers and related products. Kronologi Asia Berhad was founded in 2002 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
